data.marketing-page-pricing-title: Precios — paquetes de precios para los usuarios, compañeros de trabajo y empresas | andcards Suite
data.marketing-page-pricing-description: andcards precios, cuotas, solicitud de demostración, software para el precio de los espacios de coworking, aplicación para el precio de los espacios de coworking
data.marketing-page-pricing-features-booking: Book meeting rooms and event spaces.
data.marketing-page-pricing-features-membersh: Organize available desks and office space.
data.marketing-page-pricing-features-iot-devi: View all smart office devices in a single dashboard.
data.marketing-page-pricing-headline: It Doesn't Get More Expensive as You Grow
data.marketing-page-pricing-notice: All prices are indicative and subject to applicable taxes in your country and payment method fees. All prices are per meeting room per month before tax. If you can’t see your country in the list, please contact us and we’ll provide a rate.
data.marketing-page-pricing-questions-descrip: Talk to us. We're available 24/7, even during holidays.
data.marketing-page-pricing-subheadline: You only pay for the booking system. Everything else is on us :)
